output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}

ucsb_grad <- read_csv(here("data", "ucsb_grad_data.csv" ))

```

Update the graph by:
Adding an argument position = “fill” to the geom_col() line, which will convert the columns from absolute counts (enrollment) to proportions
Updating the axis labels

```{r}
ggplot(data = ucsb_grad, aes(x = year_abbr, y = domestic_enrollment)) +
  geom_col(aes(fill = ethnicity)) 
```
